page.title: 06LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: After school at 3pm I usually play with my friends Gary and Jonathan. They come to my house and I get changed Into other clothes and then we go to gary and Jonathans houses. My mate who is sixeen goes to a sailing club so we are allowed in his boat and we sail around in the river. We go in at half past five to have our dinner. Then we come out again and sometimes we have competions on jonathans computer playing 'Defender'. We go in and scrounge some money off our mums and spend it on sweets. On saturday we sometimes bike it up to Arlesford and places around.we sometimes go up to the university to play tennis. Then we go round Garys and have a sodastream.
